

# PHARE github actions container info

PHARE uses a custom container on the github container registry. <br />

    pharchive/phare_dep/ubuntu

The repo is https://github.com/PHARCHIVE/phare_ubuntu_dep_images <br />

Details of the current container can be see at: <br />
https://github.com/PHARCHIVE/phare_ubuntu_dep_images/pkgs/container/phare_dep%2Fubuntu

A new container is published by PR actions (no merge required) <br />

You may require approval to run the PR actions, ask an "admin". <br />
